metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31598 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The function ezxml_decode() performs incorrect memory handling while parsing crafted XML files, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
netcdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
scilab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
